name: Pradeep Varakantham
content: Pradeep Reddy VARAKANTHAM | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile Pradeep Reddy VARAKANTHAM Full-time Faculty Professor of Computer Science; Director, CARE.AI Lab; Coordinator, BSc (CS) Artificial Intelligence Track School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research Statement Faculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of Southern California, 2007 Teaching Topics Computer as an Analysis Tool Software Systems & Solutions electives IS Software Foundations Object Oriented Application Development Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to Prakhar Gautam GE Zichang HILLIER Dylan Alexander Slavin LU Yuxiao JIANG Hao Sidney TIO Xi Rong BELAIRE Roman Lok-Ming Tejas DESHPANDE (tejasd.2019 [at] dba.smu.edu.sg), DBA +65 68280519 pradeepv@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceHuman-Machine Collaborative SystemsHuman-Computer InteractionUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentSafety, Security & FairnessTrustworthiness of Digital Platforms & Devices Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation Artificial Intelligence for transportation & security A.I. for Safety and Security
